JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
	chart_type="area"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, scenario
			, metric
			, ok_mean
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND type = 'USR'
		  AND metric = 'users.active'
	`
| sort time
| rename ok_mean = activeUsers
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats by=[timegroup, scenario] activeUsers=AVG(activeUsers)
| chart 
	by=["scenario"] 
	type = param(chart_type)
	x= timegroup
	y= activeUsers
	showaxes=true
	showfalse=legend
	stacked=true
	pointradius=1

| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, scenario
			, metric
			, ok_mean
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND type = 'USR'
		  AND metric = 'users.total_started'
	`
| sort time
| rename ok_mean = usersTotalStarted
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats by=[timegroup, scenario] usersTotalStarted=AVG(usersTotalStarted)
| chart 
	by=["scenario"] 
	type = "sparkline" 
	x = timegroup
	y = usersTotalStarted
	type = param(chart_type, "area")
	pointradius=1
	showaxes = false
	showlegend = false
	stacked = true
	tension=0
	multichart=false
	# following overrides the settings above

| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, scenario
			, metric
			, ok_mean
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND type = 'USR'
		  AND metric = 'users.total_stopped'
	`
| sort time
| rename ok_mean = usersTotalStopped
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats by=[timegroup, scenario] usersTotalStopped=AVG(usersTotalStopped)
| chart 
	by=["scenario"] 
	x = timegroup
	y = usersTotalStopped
	type = param(chart_type, "area")
	pointradius=1
	showaxes = false
	showlegend = false
	stacked = true
	tension=0
	multichart=false

| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
	chart_type="area"
| global
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="15vw"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, metric
			, ok_count
			, ko_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_mean
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
		  AND type = 'REQ'
	`

| set time = time * 1000
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup, metric] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"ko_count"	=sum("ko_count")
	"min"	=min("ok_min")
	"mean"	=avg("ok_mean")
	"max"	=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"	=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)
| stats # now make statistics by request and create groups for charts
	by=[metric] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"ko_count"	=sum("ko_count")
	"min"	=min("min")
	"mean"	=avg("mean")
	"max"	=max("max")
	"stdev"	=avg("stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("p75", 75)
	"p95"	=perc("p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("p99", 99)
	"counts" = records()
	"metrics" = records()
| formatfield
	request=[
			  ['css', "max-width", "20vw"]
			 ,['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
			 ,['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		]
			
	fields(request, "counts", "metrics")=['align', "right"]
	
	[mean, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
	
| formatchart 
	fields=["counts"] 	
	y=["ok_count", "ko_count"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type=param("chart_type", "area") 
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	showaxes=false
	showlegend = false
	pointradius=0
| formatchart 
	fields=["metrics"] 
	by=[]
	y=["min", "mean", "p95", "max"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type=param("chart_type", "area") 
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	showaxes=false
	showlegend = false
	pointradius=0
| display 
	as=table 
	sizes = [10, 25, 50, 100]
	defaultsize=10

widgets.TITLE: Overall Response Time
widgets.TITLE_INFO: The average response time of all requests with status OK.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
	chart_type="area"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, metric
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_mean
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest()+`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
		  AND type = 'REQ'
	`
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup] 
	"min"	=min("ok_min")
	"mean"	=avg("ok_mean")
	"max"	=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"	=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)
| chart 
	fields=["counts"] 	
	y=["min", "mean", "p95", "max"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type=param('chart_type')
	pointradius=0 
	tension=0
	multichart=false

widgets.TITLE: Requests By OK/KO
widgets.TITLE_INFO: Request Count by status Okay and Not Okay

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
	chart_type = "area"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, metric
			, ok_count
			, ko_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND type = 'REQ'
		  
	`

| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"ko_count"	=sum("ko_count")
| chart 
	fields=["counts"] 	
	y=["ok_count", "ko_count"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type= param(chart_type, "area")
	pointradius=0 
	showaxes = false
	showlegend = false
	tension=0
	multichart=false

widgets.TITLE: Statistics as CSV (Double Click to Select All)

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
	chart_settings={charttype: "area"}
| global
	charttype = tojson(param("chart_settings", {})).charttype
	sparktype= case( 
					(globals(charttype) ~= '.*area'), "sparkarea"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*bar'), "sparkbar"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*line'), "sparkline"
					, true, "sparkarea"
				)
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="15vw"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, scenario
			, metric
			, code
			, ok_count
			, ko_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_mean
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND type = 'REQ'
	`
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[simulation, scenario, metric] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"ko_count"	=sum("ko_count")
	"min"	=min("ok_min")
	"mean"	=avg("ok_mean")
	"max"	=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"	=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)
| display as=csv menu=false

widgets.TITLE: Gantt Chart
widgets.TITLE_INFO: This Gantt chart shows first and last execution time by requests. Useful to see if things were executed during the whole test.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
	chart_settings={charttype: "area"}
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, metric
			, ok_count
			, ko_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_mean
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND ok_count > 0
		  AND type = 'REQ'
	`
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[metric] 
	"FROM"	= min(time)
	"TO"	= max(time)
| chart 
	by=[metric] 
	type='gantt'
	x=FROM # start time in epoch milliseconds
	y=TO   # end time in epoch milliseconds
	showaxes=false

widgets.TITLE: Statistics as XML (Double Click to Select All)

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
	chart_settings={charttype: "area"}
| global
	charttype = tojson(param("chart_settings", {})).charttype
	sparktype= case( 
					(globals(charttype) ~= '.*area'), "sparkarea"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*bar'), "sparkbar"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*line'), "sparkline"
					, true, "sparkarea"
				)
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="15vw"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, scenario
			, metric
			, code
			, ok_count
			, ko_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_mean
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND type = 'REQ'
	`
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[simulation, scenario, metric] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"ko_count"	=sum("ko_count")
	"min"	=min("ok_min")
	"mean"	=avg("ok_mean")
	"max"	=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"	=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)
| display as=xml menu=false

| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
	compare_to = object(
					 'earliest', earliest()
					,'latest', latest()
				)
| meta
	'timerange' = tojson(param('compare_to'))
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, metric
			, ok_count
			, ko_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_mean
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ meta('timerange').latest +`
		  AND time >= `+ meta('timerange').earliest +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND type = 'REQ'
	`

| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[metric] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"ko_count"	=sum("ko_count")
	"min"	=min("ok_min")
	"mean"	=avg("ok_mean")
	"max"	=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"	=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)
;
| meta
	timerange = object(
				   'earliest', earliest()
				 , 'latest', latest()
				)
| mimic
;
| resultcompare
	by=[metric]
	percentformat = [['percent', $threshold_good$, $threshold_bad$, "bg", "cfw-gray"], [align, center]]
| formatfield
	request=[
			  ['css', "max-width", "20vw"]
			 ,['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
			 ,['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		]
			
	fields(metric, "counts", "metrics")=['align', "right"]
	[mean, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
| display 
	as=table
	download=true

JSON_SETTINGS.description: Compare the data selected with this time range picker (A), to the data shown above, selected with the dashboards time range picker (B). Preferably this time range you choose here should be earlier than the one selected for the dashboard. Thresholds are in percentages.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults 
	database_id= -1
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
	chart_type= "area"
| global
	charttype = tojson(param("chart_settings", {})).charttype
	sparktype= case( 
					(globals(charttype) ~= '.*area'), "sparkarea"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*bar'), "sparkbar"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*line'), "sparkline"
					, true, "sparkarea"
				)
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="17vw"
| meta name="data"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, metric
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_mean
			, ok_p95
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
	`
;
#####################################
# MIN
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_min"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_min" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# AVG
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_mean"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_mean" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# P95
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_p95"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_p95" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# MAX
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_max"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_max" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;


#####################################
# Join
| meta name = "INDEX"
| source empty records = 100
| set PERC = count() + 1
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right" # join MIN
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join AVG
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join P95
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join MAX
| resultremove "data"
| rename PERC = Percentile
| chart 
	y=["ok_min", "ok_mean", "ok_p95", "ok_max"]	
	x=Percentile
	type="line"
	pointradius=2
	spangaps=true
	xtype=linear
	xlabel = "Percentile"
	ylabel = "Response Time"

widgets.TITLE: Tests Settings During Selected Timeframe
widgets.TITLE_INFO: Shows all settings from all the tests. Coloring on time column as grouping for same time.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
| meta
	lasttime = "X"
	cssstyle = null
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id)
	query= `
		SELECT *
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_testsettings
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
	`
| sort time reverse = true
| set 
	hue = (time / 1000) % 255
	time = timeformat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss", time)
| formatcss fields=[time] style= "background-color: hsla("+hue+",66%,40%, 1.0);"
| remove execid, hue
| rename pacingseconds = pacing
| display menu=button

widgets.TITLE: Requests By Status
widgets.TITLE_INFO: Request Count by Status Codes. Code "000" stand for unknown status code, for example on connection error.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults
	simulation="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='gatlytron'
	chart_type = "area"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, simulation
			, metric
			, code
			, ok_count
			, ko_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'gatlytron') + `_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ earliest() +`
		  AND simulation LIKE '%`+ param("simulation", "none") +`%'
		  AND type = 'REQ'
		  
	`

| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| set count = ok_count + ko_count
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup, code] 
	"count"	= sum("count")
| chart 
	by=["code"]
	y=[count]	
	x=timegroup 
	type= param(chart_type, "area")
	pointradius=0 
	showaxes = false
	showlegend = false
	tension=0
	multichart=false

parameters.LABEL: Query Select
parameters.NAME: simulation
parameters.VALUE:
| source postgres 
	environment={"id":5,"name":"Postgres Localhost"} 
	query= `
		SELECT DISTINCT simulation FROM gatlytron_stats
		WHERE time <= `+ latest() +`
		  AND time >= `+ timeOffset(earliest(), -30, "d") +`
	`

parameters.LABEL: Query Select
parameters.NAME: request
parameters.VALUE:
| source postgres 
	environment={"id":5,"name":"Postgres Localhost"} 
	query= `
		SELECT DISTINCT metric FROM gatlytron_stats
		WHERE time <= `+latest()+`
		  AND time >= `+ timeOffset(earliest(), -30, "d") +`
		  AND simulation = '$simulation$'
		  ORDER BY metric
	`
